description: This is your personal dashboard where you can manage your profile and access community features.
registerCardDescription: Create your community profile card to fully join the DSML Kazakhstan community.
incompleteProfileMessage: Please complete your profile by filling in all required fields to fully join the community.
completeProfileForTelegram: Please complete your profile to verify with Telegram
emptyProfileMessage: You haven't created your profile card yet. Click 'Create Profile Card' to get started.
incompleteProfileError: Your profile is incomplete. Please complete your profile first.
noUsersFound: No users found matching your search.

changeNickname.title: Change Nickname
changeNickname.description: Your nickname is used as your unique identifier in the community
changeNickname.success: Your nickname has been successfully updated!
changeNickname.error: An error occurred while updating your nickname
changeNickname.sameError: The new nickname is the same as your current one.
changeNickname.takenError: This nickname is already taken. Please choose another one.

searchTip: Search for members by name, nickname, or position
startTypingToSearch: Start typing to search for members
